title: Interactive ChatGPT: Enhancing Business Communication and Collaboration
description: Course designed to elevate business communication and collaboration through strategic use of ChatGPT. Focus on mastering prompt crafting and context management. Covers both basic and advanced features of ChatGPT. Includes structured interactive sessions to facilitate active learning. Real-world business scenarios incorporated for practical application. Group activities and role-playing exercises to enhance engagement. Emphasizes responsible AI practices, trust, and accountability in AI-driven communications.
